comments.body:
@oranagra failed in this assert?
killing master doesn't let replicas quickly know the connection is closed ?

yes, that's the assertion that fails. for some reason when i run the test with `--single 17` it always passes, but when i run the full `./runtest-cluster` it always fails.

i did try to `puts [$replica get $slot0_key]` in a few other places of this test.
in a successful run they all show `1`, but in a non-successful one, they're all empty.

this is probably some other other difference between 6.0 and unstable.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +73,77 @@
    # Replica keys and keys to slots map still both are right
    assert_equal {1} [$replica get $slot0_key]
    assert_equal $slot0_key [$replica CLUSTER GETKEYSINSLOT 0 1]
}
